txt.en: Wanted: Light carapaces from the insects and spiders in Ered Luin.
Wanted: Light carapaces from the insects and spiders in Ered Luin. Collect them and deliver them to Dorri at Gondamon to earn favour with Thorin's Hall.
'Spiders and insects are nasty critters. You have to stomp them out early before they become an infestation.\n\n'Your efforts will echo through the halls.'
'You can find insects and spiders to the north and east of Gondamon.'
Dorri wants light carapaces. Dorri can be found standing at the west gate of Gondamon.
Deliver the light carapaces to Dorri at Gondamon
You have accepted a task to acquire light carapaces. You are to deliver them to Dorri at the western gate of Gondamon to earn favour with Thorin's Hall.
You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
